characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, choose a friendly ASURYANI unit within 24" of the psyker. Until your next Psychic phase, whenever that unit suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 5+ that wound is ignored. If a unit already has an ability with a similar effect (e.g. Ulthwe's Foresight of the Damned attribute, or the Avatar of Khaine's Molten Body ability) then the effect of Fortune replaces that of the ability until your next Psychic phase.
